tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: HiI am very excited to share my happiest experience with rhea clinic and Dr.Bharkavi mam.she is a down to earth person.actually I am from Chennai after 6 months of my marriage I had one abortion in Chennai.after tat we shifted to Bangalore and we were searching for good gynecologist for myself.I have gone to many hospital and met with many doctors but we were not satisfied with there response.luckily we went to Bharkavi mam,in the first meet itself we were so so satisfied with her response.wat type of response we were expecting the same we got it from her.she has gone through my past treatment details and we followed her advice and I conceived in the same month itself.she took special care as I had previous abortion and i was very depressed.now I am a proud mom for 1 yr baby boy,this would not be possible wothout bharkavi mam,she is a boon to all the women's who r struggling to get pregnant.like bharkavi mam we never found any doctors in Bangalore.she has a magic in her words.she is very polite and she listens our queries very patience.her explanations r very clear and practical.she never prescribed unneccesary medicines and its affordable.she is available is mobile also many doctor wont give there no for any emergency but she gives her own no to her patients and incase of any emergency we connect to her at any time. this itsself shows her most towards her patients.thank u mam this word will not be enough for wat u have done in my life.u r like a god for me and my baby thanks a lot mam.I strongly recommend Dr.Bharkavi mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: We felt good at our first visit.. doctor was very friendly and treatment was good .. it would be nice if the delivery section was also present ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After two years of marriage it was difficult for me to get pregnant and I was overweight , luckily we found Rhea clinic and heard about Dr.Bhargavi mam and visited for pregnancy checkup as i got delayed periods but was negative. Bhargavi mam scanned me and asked me to take 6 months of time to reduce weight and come back. But it took two years for me to lose 17 kgs of weight naturally, and we visited again in June 2020 and mam appreciated for losing weight and took a scan and suggested basic treatment and asked us to try for 3 months and due to lockdown we went to hometown and couldn't visit hospital but continued the medication suggested and this November i got a positive pregnancy test and we are really looking forward for better growth of baby with help of Bhargavi mam. Bhargavi mam explanation is very neat and clear and genuine treatment is provided. I recommend to visit rhea clinic without any hesitation and  you will be very satisfied with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pregnancy Tests,Female Infertility Treatment,
review: This our 1st kid after 3 yrs of marriage. until 5 months of pregnancy we had treatment and check up here. Doctor is available over phone in case of emergency. Also she had plan A & B, for foreseeing a emergency (when there is outstation or personal vacation plan for madam) and providing guidance in such situation very well in advance, which could save critical  time loss. Fortunarely we didn't had emergency situation but we had solutions on our table. Though it might be their ethics,I see the pro-actvieness  care and impressed by the service. Thanks a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Visited for follicular study today and Dr. Bhargavi response was very poor *** *** **** **** **** ********** ***** ****** ** ********* *** ***** ***** ***** * **** *** **** ***** ** ** ********* * ****** ** we are taking treatment from other doctor and just she told us to consult your doctor and get the clarity. Finally, she gave us handwritten report for this test ** **** ***** **** **** **** ** ****** ******* ****** *** **** **** ********** ***** *** the response was very poor and she didn't even explained the results. As a Gynaecologist, she should consider other patients as equal to her patients.

Irregular Timings: She gave us the appointment at 9:40am and she had come to hospital at 10:15am.**** ** ***** ** **** *** ** *** **** ******** *** ****** *******
reply_text:
Dear swetha 
You have refused any consultation and advise from me and wanted only scan.
Following the scan you wanted advise regarding follow up scans which I can‚Äôt decide as it‚Äôs interfering with your primary consultants advice and against our medical ethics.
Please note that follicular monitoring scans number is not fixed and varies from few to many and always individualised.
Hope you are blessed with your bundle of joy soon.
Regards.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to Dr Bhargavi for my pregnancy checkup,I was not able to conceive after trying for more than 2 years,I lost my hope almost,that time I checked in practo & started consulting Dr.Bhargavi,she went through my profile thoroughly & started treatment & I conceived within 6 months,but ended with an abortion, then next time when I concieved she took utmost care & did all the possible treatment & it was a healthy pregnancy for me,I gave birth to a healthy baby boy,all credit goes to Bhargavi mam,I would definitely recommend Dr Bhargavi for pregnancy related treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Rhea Clinic and Dr.  Bhargavi is my gynecologist for now.  I am eager to share my words of experience with them.  I went to many hospitals and visited many doctors but we were not satisfied there.

  For further treatment Dr.  Bhargavi was met.  He went through the details of my previous treatment and started a new treatment.  He followed the advice.  I conceived within two months.  Now after 5 years I am a mother of one child.  In case of any emergency we can contact the doctor anytime (mobile available).
 I trust her completely!

   Thank you very much
   Nithya Girish
 (C.R.Patna Hassan)

review: Didn't do a thorough check up for my wife's ailment. Was in a great hurry to wind up the consultation. reply_text:
This was a follow up consultation and please note with out a prior appointment on a busy day.
I examined mrs sharma and advised her further treatment and care for over 15 minutes for which she was happy with the symptomatic relief . For further discussion we have requested you to wait as doctors we need to see emergency patients as a priority. 
The first consultation that happened few days back was for more than 30 mins where in I had given the necessary treatment and advise and answered all your queries and concerns to your satisfaction.
Regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: family planning and full contraceptive services,
review: ****** ***** *** ********** *** *********** ** ******* ********** Was not very elaborate. Not much details were provided. She was recommending to come clinic instead of video call for some sensitive queries which do not involve physical examination.
reply_text:
This was an individual video consultation booked for your wife , once the consultation started you insisted on a couple consultation- I have answered all the queries and provided in detail information about contraceptive choices to you and your wife , we ended the video consult after you both confirmed that you got the information needed . 
Through the follow up chat option -you started sending more queries - which I answered 
You both were hesitant and were not able to ask the exact question or the information you are looking for - you two were asking same questions repeatedly - it is humanly impossible for me to assume unless you ask me clearly - that is the main reason I asked you couple to visit in person
Sensitive queries as you mentioned is exactly why you need to visit a doctor in person and can‚Äôt be addressed online. 
Please visit any doctor close by your place for help 
Hope this helps 
Regards

review: We not satisfied with doctor ,she is not  friendly with us, not clearly explained with health issues.
reply_text:
Gm I have given you the necessary and important advise regarding diet, tests,medicines, exercise,daily activity,travel, dos and donts etc .
But sorry to say that I can‚Äôt give false reassurance on the medicines you have consumed already during early pregnancy with the wishes and intentions known to you!! from a local quack with out any prescription .
Please do-not take any over the counter medicines during pregnancy.
You need to have a regular follow up with scans and tests to know the Fetal well being.
Wish you a healthy pregnancy and healthy baby
Regards.
